snippet: Washington was penalized $36 million in salary cap space and Dallas $10 million for structuring contracts in 2010 to gain an unfair advantage.
lead_paragraph: Washington was penalized $36 million in salary cap space and Dallas $10 million for structuring contracts in 2010 to gain an unfair advantage.

headline.seo: N.F.L. Strips Cowboys and Redskins of Salary Cap Room
headline.main: N.F.L. Strips Cowboys and Redskins of Salary Cap Room
